      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CharacterDitherStrategy
      Marker for the image processor that this requires a non (character) standard dithering

    • Uses of DitherStrategy in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.errordiffusionstrategy

      Subinterfaces of DitherStrategy in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.errordiffusionstrategy 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ErrorDiffusionDitherStrategy
      Interface for error diffusion strategies
      Classes in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.errordiffusionstrategy that implement DitherStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AtkinsonDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Atkinson error diffusion algorithm
      class  BurkesDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Burkes error diffusion algorithm
      class  FloydSteinbergDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Floyd-Steinberg error diffusion algorithm
      class  JarvisJudiceNinkeDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Jarvis-Judice-Ninke error diffusion algorithm
      class  LowErrorAtkinsonDitherStrategy
      Special low error dither strategy especially for Spectrum image conversion and only (currently) in use in this program, based on the Atkinson distribution but using only 25% error distribution.
      class  NoDitherStrategy
      Direct colour conversion with no error distribution (hence no error is distributed in distributeError()!)
      class  SierraFilterLightStrategy
      Implementation of the Sierra Filter Light error diffusion algorithm
      class  StuckiDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the Stucki error diffusion algorithm

    • Uses of DitherStrategy in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.orderedditherstrategy

      Subinterfaces of DitherStrategy in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.orderedditherstrategy 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  OrderedDitherStrategy
      Interface for ordered dither algorithms
      Classes in uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.orderedditherstrategy that implement DitherStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BayerEightByEightDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the classical Bayer 8x8 ordered dither algorithm
      class  BayerFourByFourDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the classical Bayer 4x4 ordered dither algorithm
      class  BayerTwoByOneOrderedDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the classical Bayer 2x1 ordered dither algorithm
      class  BayerTwoByTwoOrderedDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the classical Bayer 2x2 ordered dither algorithm
      class  LightnessOrderedDitherStrategy
      Implementation of the "Lightness" ordered dither algorithm found on news groups (author unknown)
      class  MagicSquareDitherStrategy
      Traditional "magic square" 4x4 dither algorithm whose rows and columns total 100
      class  NasikMagicSquareDitherStrategy
      Special case of a magic square which has horizontal, vertical and diagonal totals all equal.
      class  OmegaOrderedDitherStrategy
      Ordered dithering algorithm based on an even distribution devised by Omega from World of Spectrum forums, revised by Benjamin Brown

    • Uses of DitherStrategy in uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher

      Methods in uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher with parameters of type DitherStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.concurrent.Future<WorkContainer> WorkDispatcher.submitPreviewWork(java.awt.Image original, DitherStrategy dither)
      Similar to submit work (the same processing procedure is followed) however no SCR output is provided, the default resolution of 256x192 is used and the dither can be specified.
      Constructors in uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher with parameters of type DitherStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkProcessor(DitherStrategy dither)
      Preview constructor for when we need a result from a given dither strategy as opposed to that selected in options
